summary: Provides a NeMo‑compatible wrapper around a Stable Diffusion latent diffusion pipeline, managing model loading, configuration, image and text encoding, and training utilities so the diffusion model can be used as a guidance source for multimodal tasks such as neural radiance field (NeRF) optimization.
business_intent: Facilitates the integration of state‑of‑the‑art text‑to‑image generation into NVIDIA’s AI platform, enabling developers and researchers to leverage diffusion models for content creation, data augmentation, and 3D scene synthesis within enterprise or research workflows.
